game_description: Vemaker is a business oriented social space and metaverse, both accessible from web browsers and VR. In this world you can join conference halls, networking spaces, workshops, fair zones and entertainment areas and start to give conferences, work & study with your friends and colleagues or attend different activities. This live world is one of our public space that you can enjoy now.
review_1: This is a bold platform that serves as a social ground for hundreds of people. Its working both on web browsers and VR. But do not forget to register on vemaker.com before you log in to the VR version.
